divs: Sighting DetailsUnidentified lights were seen around the time of 11:45pm July 29th, 2008 in McGregor Texas. The lights were bright and seemed to be appearing and disappearing at random points over the nearby Hercules Naval weapons plant where they produce and test solid rocket motors and missiles. The sighting was viewed by more than 30 people, all on a cigarette break at the Convergys Building in McGregor. This same building use the belong to Hercules before being purchased by Dell Computer and then taken over by the city of McGregor.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in McGregor
There were no other sightings in McGregor on or around July 29th 2008
